content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1591280057119{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1591279706765{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Check out how this agency more than doubled its monthly revenue

[vc_column_text]Using SharpSpring’s agency-focused automation tools, Credit Union 2.0 — an agency helping clients in the financial sector — was able to double its client base and show those clients more value from their partnership.

Discover how they used SharpSpring to:

  • Build higher value relationships
  • Show clients more ROI
  • Grow monthly recurring revenue

“We leverage SharpSpring to build up our clients’ online presence, generate a consistent flow of leads, and create nurture sequences that drive lead engagement and sales.”

– Kirk Drake, President & Founder, Credit Union 2.0

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
